vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.2.42
§ Shobai = "glorious"
ancestor of a family of doorkeepers of the temple who returned with Zerubbabel
vocabInfos._es_Definition: jefe de familia; porteros; post exílico
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
朔拜 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "光榮的;輝煌的"
跟隨所羅巴伯歸回的一個聖殿守門者家族祖先
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
朔拜 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "光荣的;辉煌的"
跟随所罗巴伯归回的一个圣殿守门者家族祖先
